config.messageText: Supported Mesh formats are: - Irrlicht scene and mesh (.irr, .irrmesh, .xml) - 3D Studio (.3ds) - Blitz3D (.b3d) - COLLADA 1.2/1.3 (.dae, .xml) - Cartography shop 4 (.csm) - DirectX (.x) - DeleD (.dmf) - Maya (.obj) - Milkshape (.ms3d) - My3D (.my3D) - OCT (.oct) - Ogre3d (.mesh) - Pulsar LMTools (.lmts) - Quake 3 levels (.bsp) - Quake 2 models (.md2) - Stereolithography format (.stl)
